channel.title: New way of making desktop website!
channel.description:
Ok I use a different method of making a website come on your desktop, this only works with windows and you need IE.
Ok right click on desktop, and click properties a window should pop up, click on the web tab thing and tick the box which says My Current Homepage.
Now it will show your homepage of IE! Just change the homepage to whatever and have fun :D
One con: If you make it lets say google as the desktop, when you search something it will search in a new window :S

item.title: New way of making desktop website!
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Lol, I wasn’t aware there was another way. If your going to try to make someone else’s tutorial obsolete at least make your understandable.

Read full topic
